A Caring Recovery for Young Adult Men

Triple Peaks Recovery Center is a nationally accredited, gender specific, residential-extended care addiction treatment program for young adult men ages 18-29. Located in beautiful Colorado Springs, Colorado, Triple Peaks Recovery integrates a variety of individual, group, and trauma therapies to treat both substance use disorder and many co-occurring mental health issues. Our six-month addiction treatment program allows each individual within our treatment setting to incrementally move forward in their recovery. Our men’s program is favorably structured for young adult men and specifically designed to promoted long-term recovery in an accountable, communal setting.

LEARN MORE

Why Extended Care Treatment?

Studies show that the longer young adults participate in treatment programs and stay active in their recovery, the more likely it is that they will achieve long-term sobriety and stability.

Contact Us

A Caring Recovery

Call Now

Everyday millions of individuals and their families are affected by substance use disorder. Studies show that the longer young adults participate in treatment programs and stay active in their recovery, the more likely it is that they will achieve long-term sobriety and stability. We believe it paramount to the long-term success of young adults and their recovery that they continue with extended care treatment. Our client’s personal growth and recovery from alcohol and substance abuse is our highest priority. It’s why we do what we do. At Triple Peaks and Serenity Peaks we value how special your loved one is and we are committed to their long-term recovery and personal growth.
